SourceInformation.Title: Inventory Of Carbon and Energy Database

Data.Name: General (UK average)
Data.Description: Mixture taken from average UK sector cement EPD.  86.1% clinker, 0.04% ggbs,  3.4% fly ash,  4.8% gypsum,  5.1% limestone, 0.56% MACs. By weight. Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM I, Ordinary Portland Cement (OPC)
Data.Description: CEM I is a 'pure' cement, Ordinary Portland Cement (OPC). Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II-A-S - 13% GGBs
Data.Description: This cement permits between 6-20% ggbs Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-S - 28% GGBs
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% ggbs Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/A-P - 13% natural pozzolanic ash
Data.Description: This cement permits between 6-20% natural pozzolanic ash Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-P 28% natural pozzolanic ash
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% natural pozzolanic ash Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/A-V - 13% fly ash siliceous
Data.Description: This cement permits between 6-20% siliceous fly ash Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-V - 28% fly ash siliceous
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% siliceous fly ash Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/A-W - 13% fly ash calcareous
Data.Description: This cement permits between 6-20% calcareous fly ash Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-W - 28% fly ash calcareous
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% calcareous fly ash Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/A-L - 13% limestone
Data.Description: This cement permits between 6-20% limestone Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-L- 28% limestone
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% limestone Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/A-LL - 13% limestone
Data.Description: This cement permits between 6-20% limestone Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-LL - 28% limestone
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% limestone Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/A-M - 16% cement replacement
Data.Description: This cement permits between 12-20% cement replacements Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM II/B-M - 28% cement replacement
Data.Description: This cement permits between 21-35% cement replacements Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM III/A - 50.5% GGBS
Data.Description: This cement permits between 36-65% ggbs Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM III/B - 73% GGBS
Data.Description: This cement permits between 66-80% ggbs Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM III/C - 88% GGBS
Data.Description: This cement permits between 81-95% ggbs Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM IV/A - 23% cement replacement
Data.Description: This cement permits between 11-35% pozzolanic materials, e.g. fly ash, pozzolanic ash. Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM IV/B - 46% cement replacement
Data.Description: This cement permits between 38-55% pozzolanic materials, e.g. fly ash, pozzolanic ash. Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM V/A - 24% GGBS and 24% cement replacement
Data.Description: This cement permits between 18-30% ggbs and 18-30% pozzolanic materials.  Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: CEM V/B - 36% GGBS and 36% cement replacement
Data.Description: This cement permits between 31-49% ggbs and 31-49% pozzolanic materials.  Estimated from ICE Cement, Mortar, Concrete model.

Data.Name: General concrete admixtures – Average of data collected
Data.Description: Average from EPDs collected for admixtures.

Data.Name: Concrete admixtures – Air entrainers, Europe
Data.Description: European EPD, from European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations Ltd. (EFCA). Density of 1-1.6kg/l in accordance with the IBU PCR 07.2014 Part B for concrete admixtures

Data.Name: Concrete admixtures – Hardening Accelerators
Data.Description: European EPD, from European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations Ltd. (EFCA). Density of 1-1.6kg/l in accordance with the IBU PCR 07.2014 Part B for concrete admixtures

Data.Name: Concrete admixtures - Plasticisers and Superplasticisers
Data.Description: European EPD, from European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations Ltd. (EFCA). Density of 1-1.6kg/l in accordance with the IBU PCR 07.2014 Part B for concrete admixtures

Data.Name: Concrete admixtures – Retarders
Data.Description: European EPD, from European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations Ltd. (EFCA). Density of 1-1.6kg/l in accordance with the IBU PCR 07.2014 Part B for concrete admixtures

Data.Name: Concrete admixtures – Set Accelerators
Data.Description: European EPD, from European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations Ltd. (EFCA). Density of 1-1.6kg/l in accordance with the IBU PCR 07.2014 Part B for concrete admixtures
